title: ‚ÄòThis is how we did it‚Äô: China embassy has advice for Delhi pollution
content: China's Beijing has significantly improved its air quality by implementing stringent vehicle emission controls, phasing out old vehicles, and promoting electric mobility. The nation also undertook industrial restructuring, relocating heavy industries and transforming former factory sites. These comprehensive, large-scale, and urgent measures offer valuable lessons for India's approach to tackling air pollution.

title: 'Behaving worse than hyenas': Actor Nidhhi Agerwal mobbed at Hyderabad mall
content: Actor Nidhhi Agerwal experienced a distressing situation at a song launch event in Hyderabad, where an unruly crowd pressed in on her. Security had to intervene to escort her to her vehicle amidst the chaos. The incident has ignited discussions on celebrity safety and crowd control, with singer Chinmayi Sripada condemning the behavior as harassment.

title: No fuel without PUC, old cars barred, WFH: What you must know before taking out your car in Delhi
content: Delhi has implemented stringent anti-pollution measures under GRAP-IV, including a ban on non-BS VI vehicles from outside the city and denial of fuel to vehicles without valid pollution certificates. Offices are mandated to have 50% staff work from home. These actions aim to combat severe air quality expected to persist until December 27.

title: IND vs SA: 'No cricket...AQI 411' - Tharoor‚Äôs stinging post after Lucknow T20I is lost to smog
content: The fourth T20I between India and South Africa in Lucknow was abandoned without a ball bowled due to persistent fog and poor air quality. Senior Congress leader Shashi Tharoor criticized the venue selection, highlighting the hazardous AQI and suggesting Thiruvananthapuram as a better alternative. Player welfare concerns were amplified as Hardik Pandya was seen wearing a mask during warm-ups.

title: 'You are over valued and a reasonable percentage will ...': Bill Gates to tech firms
content: Microsoft co-founder Bill Gates warns that many AI companies with sky-high valuations face an uncertain future in a fiercely competitive market. He anticipates market corrections, stating that only a select few will achieve long-term success. Despite these concerns, Gates remains optimistic about AI's profound potential to revolutionize healthcare, education, and agriculture, emphasizing its role in delivering tangible benefits for humanity.

title: Gold & silver price prediction: Gold, silver to touch new highs? Here's the outlook
content: Gold and silver price prediction today: Gold prices are surging to new peaks, maintaining a strong bullish trend with higher highs and lows. Silver also shows significant positive momentum, breaking out of consolidation. Experts anticipate further gains for both precious metals.

title: Peace prize to Machado: Why is WikiLeaks founder Julian Assange suing Nobel panel?
content: WikiLeaks founder Julian Assange has filed a criminal complaint in Sweden against senior Nobel Foundation figures, accusing them of economic crimes and facilitating war crimes. The complaint targets the award of the 2025 Nobel Peace Prize to Mar√≠a Corina Machado, alleging the disbursement of funds contradicts Alfred Nobel's will and could aid aggression.

title: Flying spy? Seagull with made-in-China GPS tracker found on Karnataka beach
content: A GPS-tagged seagull on Karwar beach, initially causing local concern, was revealed to be part of a scientific study by the Wildlife and Nature Protection Society of Sri Lanka. Forest officials confirmed the device was for tracking migration patterns, not surveillance, after the exhausted bird was rescued.

title: Microsoft 365 fixes regional outage: Services restored in Japan and China; what caused disruption
content: Microsoft 365 services in Japan and China have been fully restored after a widespread outage disrupted essential tools like Outlook and Teams. A routing fault within Microsoft's infrastructure caused intermittent login failures and slow performance for hours. Engineers successfully rebalanced traffic, resolving the issue with no data loss reported.

title: Exclusive: 'Ghar wapsi hai meri' - Bishnoi looking to form deadly combo with Jadeja at RR
content: India spinner Ravi Bishnoi expressed immense joy after being bought by Rajasthan Royals for Rs 7.2 crore in the IPL mini-auction, calling it a 'ghar wapsi' (homecoming). He is eager to play in front of his home crowd and contribute to the team's success, aiming to create good memories with wickets and wins.

title: A test of humanity in 60 seconds: How Bengaluru hospitals turned away a dying man
content: A Bengaluru man died of a heart attack after being denied emergency care at two private hospitals. His wife's desperate pleas for help on the road were ignored by passing vehicles until a pedestrian intervened. The incident highlights a critical lack of compassion and delayed medical response.

title: Kabaddi player‚Äôs murder suspect killed in dramatic gunfight, 2 cops wounded
content: An accused in the murder of kabaddi promoter Digvijay Singh was gunned down by police in Derabassi after a shootout. Two policemen were injured during the encounter. This follows the arrest of alleged mastermind Aishdeep Singh, who was attempting to flee to Muscat.

title: Amazon layoffs: Biggest ever job cuts in Europe; these roles are impacted the most
content: Amazon is cutting 370 jobs, or 8.5% of its Luxembourg workforce, impacting software developers as the company embraces AI. This reduction follows a global layoff of 14,000 employees and comes after negotiations resulted in a reduced number from the initial plan. Despite the cuts, Amazon reaffirms Luxembourg as a strategic European partner.

title: Rupee heals after historic lows! Opens 6 paise up against US dollar ‚Äî What lies ahead?
content: The Indian rupee is showing a tentative recovery against the US dollar, climbing after hitting historic lows earlier this week. Aggressive intervention by the Reserve Bank of India is credited with this rebound, as the central bank sold dollars to curb depreciation.

title: 'We made a lot more money ... ': Trump says tariffs are paying US military $1,776 'warrior dividend'
content: US President Donald Trump announced a $1,776 "warrior dividend" for over 1.45 million military personnel, funded by tariffs. This one-time Christmas bonus aims to honor service members, with payments expected before the holidays. Trump highlighted tariffs' revenue generation, also linking them to drug price negotiations and promising economic growth.

title: ‚ÄòBha Bha Ba‚Äô reviews on X: First half called 'pure madness'
content: Get ready for laughs: Dileep's 'Bha.Bha.Ba.' has officially premiered, bringing a rush of excitement to theaters with its lively, retro charm. Early audience feedback showcases a first half brimming with sheer madness and joy, highlighting comedic flair over conventional storytelling.

title: Leadership lessons from lord Krishna for today's corporate world
content: Lord Krishna's ancient wisdom from the Bhagavad Gita offers timeless leadership lessons for modern work life. His emphasis on responsibility over reward, authentic leadership, and emotional steadiness provides a framework for building trust and fostering capability. These principles highlight the enduring power of inner discipline and balanced action in navigating workplace pressures.

title: Drugs, parties, penalties: B'luru apartment body booked for running parallel justice system
content: Police in Bengaluru have launched a criminal probe into an apartment association and a security firm. They allegedly ran an illegal system, imposing penalties for drug possession and late-night parties. This system suppressed serious crimes, denying justice to victims. The association collected over Rs 3.3 lakh in fines. Police are investigating the deliberate cover-up of offenses.

title: 'Sold wheat to watch the match': Fans left heartbroken; IND-SA T20I abandoned due to fog
content: Dense fog and smog forced the abandonment of the India-South Africa T20I in Lucknow without a ball bowled, leaving thousands of fans deeply disappointed. Despite ticket refunds being available, many felt compensation couldn't replace the missed experience. The incident has sparked renewed criticism over scheduling matches in North India during peak pollution season.

title: Wages up, prices down: Trump says he ‚Äòfixed‚Äô US economy ‚Äî here‚Äôs how ‚Äòtariffs‚Äô fits in
content: President Trump highlighted his administration's economic achievements, focusing on reduced inflation, increased investment driven by tariffs, and rising wages. He claimed his policies reversed a dire economic situation, bringing down prices for essential goods and energy while boosting household incomes and national security.

title: ‚ÄòKejriwal govt didn‚Äôt do anything‚Äô: Bearing brunt of AAP‚Äôs wrongdoings, says Parvesh Verma; Delhi AQI in 'severe'
content: Delhi faces severe air pollution. Minister Parvesh Verma criticizes the previous AAP government for its inaction. Stricter pollution control measures are now in effect. Non-BS-VI vehicles are banned from entering the city. The 'No PUC, No Fuel' rule is enforced. CNG and electric vehicles are exempt. These steps aim to combat the pollution crisis.

title: Delhi smog tightens grip: AQI stays ‚Äòvery poor‚Äô at 370; visibility dips
content: Delhi is battling severe smog, with air quality reaching 'very poor' levels. Authorities have activated all Stage-IV measures under the Graded Response Action Plan across Delhi-NCR to combat the escalating pollution. Inspections revealed significant dust and waste accumulation on roads, highlighting the urgent need for improved maintenance and dust-control efforts.

title: Delhi air quality worsens: IGI airport issues advisory; Anand Vihar AQI hits ‚Äòsevere‚Äô at 415
content: In a travel advisory issued at 4.30 am, Delhi Airport authorities informed passengers that foggy conditions had reduced visibility levels, prompting the implementation of LVP to ensure safe aircraft operations. However, officials clarified that there was no major disruption to flight services at the airport at the time of the advisory.

title: Exclusive: Celina Jaitly on divorce: 'I had to rescue myself'
content: Last month, Celina Jaitly filed a domestic violence case against her husband, Austrian hotelier Peter Haag. The actress also talks about her brother Major (retd) Vikrant Kumar Jaitly who has been detained in Abu Dhabi

title: Gisele B√ºndchen spotted jet skiing in Florida with Joaquim Valente amid Tom Brady buzz
content: Gisele B√ºndchen and Joaquim Valente embraced a sun-drenched holiday with a jet ski outing near their Florida home, prioritizing family and privacy after welcoming their son. This choice reflects B√ºndchen's current focus on grounding moments and personal strength over public spectacle. Meanwhile, Tom Brady confirmed his NFL retirement is permanent due to his ownership stake in the Raiders.

title: Stock market today: Nifty50 opens below 25,800; BSE Sensex down around 150 points
content: Stock market today: Indian equity benchmark indices, Nifty50 and BSE Sensex, opened in red in trade on Thursday. While Nifty50 was below 25,800, BSE Sensex was down around 150 points

title: Mark Zuckerberg spars with Merab Dvalishvili after loss to Petr Yan
content: Mark Zuckerberg drew attention after sparring with Merab Dvalishvili days after the former champion lost his bantamweight title to Petr Yan. The session highlighted Zuckerberg‚Äôs growing involvement in MMA while Dvalishvili quickly returned to training. As analysts predict a possible trilogy fight with Yan, the rivalry continues to build momentum.

title: Eagles rookie Cooper DeJean and Nikki Bella spark buzz after locker room photo
content: Wrestling star Nikki Bella and Eagles rookie Cooper DeJean sparked offseason speculation after a photo of them in the Eagles' locker room circulated online.  WWE star Grayson Waller later revealed DeJean attended RAW to see Bella, connecting the dots for fans. Neither has publicly commented, leaving the interaction open to interpretation.

title: Digital manifesto, social media & more: Hyderabad techie quits MNC, uses tech to win big in gram panchayat polls
content: A former Cognizant manager, Praveen Kumar Jogannagari, has transitioned from a 15-year MNC career to politics, winning a gram panchayat ward member seat in Sangareddy district with over 75% of votes. Leveraging technology and personal outreach, he aims to address urbanisation challenges and water scarcity in Malkapur village.

title: 260 cases! India is world's worst dope offender: Tops list for third straight time
content: India has once again topped the global list for dope violations, with 260 athletes flagged in 2024, according to a WADA report. This marks the third consecutive year the nation leads in doping offenses. Despite intensified testing, the high figures raise concerns as India prepares to host major sporting events.

title: 'Inherited a mess, fixing it': Donald Trump hits out at Biden ‚Äî top quotes from White House speech
content: President Trump highlighted significant achievements in foreign policy, economy, and border security during his address. He claimed to have resolved numerous international conflicts, boosted the US economy through tariffs and investment, and strengthened border control. Trump asserted his administration's focus on law-abiding citizens over perceived special interests.

title: Caught on camera! 'Angry' Bumrah snatches phone after fan ignores warning - Watch
content: Indian pacer Jasprit Bumrah was seen losing his temper at an airport, snatching a fan's phone who was recording him without permission. After a brief exchange, Bumrah returned the device. The cricketer is currently part of India's T20I series against South Africa, with India leading 2-1.

title: Florida YouTuber Ross Creations under investigation over viral opossum video
content: YouTuber Ross Creations faces backlash and an official investigation after a viral video showed him launching a wild opossum with a catapult. The incident, which occurred in Florida, has drawn condemnation from animal rights groups and prompted authorities to look into potential animal cruelty charges. The video has since been removed, and Ross Creations has not yet commented publicly.

title: Meet Amandeep Singh Bola; PIO who ran towards Bondi bullets, pounced on shooter
content: A Punjabi-Sikh New Zealander, Amandeep Singh Bola, displayed remarkable bravery during the Bondi beach shooting. While enjoying a kebab, he heard gunshots and instinctively ran towards the danger. Bola tackled one of the gunmen, disarmed him, and held him down until police arrived, embodying the spirit of multiculturalism amidst chaos.

title: ‚ÄòKis Kisko Pyaar Karoon 2‚Äô Box Office: Collections drop to Rs 75 lakh
content: Kapil Sharma's latest film, 'Kis Kisko Pyaar Karoon 2', is facing a tough time at the box office, hitting a new low with Rs 75 lakh collection on Wednesday. Despite a moderate weekend, the movie's earnings have dipped significantly, accumulating around Rs 10 crore in six days. Upcoming releases are expected to further challenge its theatrical run.

title: Top stocks to buy: Stock recommendations for today - check list
content: Top stock market recommendations: Aakash K Hindocha, has identified ZF Commercial Vehicle Control Systems India, Glenmark Pharmaceuticals, and BPCL as top stock recommendations. He also provided an optimistic outlook for Nifty and Bank Nifty, anticipating further gains for both indices.

title: Dhurandhar breaks Box Office records: Film tops Rs 500 crore in India; eyes Rs 1000 crore club
content: Ranveer Singh and Akshaye Khanna's spy thriller 'Dhurandhar' is making waves, nearing Rs 250 crore in its second week and surpassing Rs 500 crore in India gross collections. The film has become Ranveer Singh's highest-grossing movie globally, outperforming 'Padmaavat' and is now set to enter the Rs 1000 crore club.

title: IPL Auction: 'They missed a trick' - R Ashwin questions CSK‚Äôs strategy
content: Ravichandran Ashwin believes Chennai Super Kings missed a significant opportunity by not securing Cameron Green at the IPL 2026 mini-auction.  He suggests Kolkata Knight Riders could have employed a more patient bidding strategy to force CSK's hand earlier. Ashwin lauded Green as a generational talent, calling his acquisition by KKR brilliant.

title: Chiefs star Patrick Mahomes‚Äô injury eerily foretold by preseason commercial
content: Kansas City Chiefs' star quarterback Patrick Mahomes suffered a season-ending knee injury, missing the playoffs for the first time in his career. Following successful surgery for ACL and LCL tears, he faces an 8-9 month rehabilitation, targeting a return at the start of the 2026 season. His determination and the support of trainers offer hope for a strong comeback.

title: Shohei Ohtani and Mamiko Tanaka net worth 2025: Dodgers star‚Äôs earnings
content: Shohei Ohtani's net worth is estimated at $150 million in 2025, primarily from endorsements due to his heavily deferred Dodgers contract. His wife, Mamiko Tanaka, a former basketball player, is estimated to be worth around $70 million. Together, their combined wealth is believed to exceed $220 million, built independently through their respective athletic careers.

title: Bondi Beach shooting: Terror suspect Sajid was refused Aus citizenship many times; what we know
content: Sydney terror accused Sajid Akram, who failed to secure Australian citizenship, last renewed his Indian passport in 2022. His son Naveed was cleared by ASIO in 2019. Telangana police found their Hyderabad visits were personal, with no extremist links or visits to Pakistan. Sajid moved to Australia in 1998.

title: Silent Hill Townfall: release date, story, gameplay, platforms & key details
content: Silent Hill Townfall, a highly anticipated collaboration, may be closer than expected. A recent retail listing suggests a March 26, 2026 release, fueling speculation about a new Silent Hill Transmission.  While details remain scarce, the game promises deep psychological horror, aligning with the studio's past work and the franchise's resurgence.

title: Why Flagg is in LeBron and Kobe territory, Carrington a sneaky pickup
content: Nikola Jokic posted 39 points, 15 rebounds and 10 assists in overtime win against Houston . alperen Sengun matched the moment with a 33-point triple-double . Cade Cunningham becomes the youngest player to score at least 40 in a game .

title: Survivor pool strategy: Bills, Texans among top options in Week 16
content: ESPN Eliminator Challenge is one of the most fun games to play this NFL season . the Texans are being picked in over half of remaining entries early in the week . they are available for 58% of Eliminators Challenge entries .

title: Ward wants Titans to involve him in HC search
content: quarterback says he'll be all-in on the next head coach regardless of whether it's a defensive- or offensive-minded hire . Tennessee fired coach Brian Callahan in October after a 1-5 start to the season .

title: MVPs for every bowl game: Quinn Henicle lifts Old Dominion to 10 wins
content: the 2025 bowl season is ramping up and college football experts are here to highlight the best performances from bowl season . we'll pick MVPs from each of the 36 bowl games from Dec. 13 to Jan. 2 . RB Jo Silver's 61-yard run opened the scoring, and he finished with 116 yards on 14 carries .

title: UWCL grades for all 18 teams: Leuven get A+; Bar√ßa an A-, PSG fail
content: arsenal beat Oud-Heverlee Leuven 3-0 in the UEFA women's champions league . the first 18-team group stage is over! OH LEUVEN (A+) they finished 12th, but sealing a spot in the knockout-phase playoffs would have been beyond the minnows' wildest dreams .

title: 150 prospects, 12 schools, 7 rounds: We stacked players in the CFP by NFL draft stock
content: the top 12 teams of the 2025 CFB season have plenty of prospects for the 2026 draft . we're identifying each player in the playoff who could be selected in the upcoming draft and which round they'd fit best right now . this is where things stand right now and a good picture of which teams could be sending a bunch of top talent to the early rounds .
